courses.name: Django Rest Framework
courses.description: Build real-world RESTful APIs using Django Rest Framework. Youâ€™ll cover CRUD, serializers, viewsets, routers, filtering, pagination, and authentication (JWT/session), then deploy an API-ready backend.

courses.name: Business Administration
courses.description: Business Administration focuses on planning, organizing, and managing business operations such as finance, marketing, human resources, and strategy to help organizations run efficiently and grow.

courses.name: Procurement and Supply Chain
courses.description: Procurement and Supply Chain Management is a course that introduces learners to how organizations plan, source, purchase, move, store, and deliver goods and services efficiently. It covers key topics such as procurement processes, supplier selection and evaluation, tendering and contract management, inventory and warehouse management, logistics and transportation, demand forecasting, and risk management. Learners also explore ethics, compliance, and cost control, and how technology (e-procurement, ERP systems, and data analytics) supports supply chain performance. By the end of the course, students can design and improve supply chain strategies that reduce costs, ensure quality, and support timely delivery in both public and private sector environments.

courses.name: Law
courses.description: Law is a course that introduces the principles, structures, and processes of legal systems. It covers how laws are made and applied, key legal concepts, and how legal reasoning is used to analyze disputes and protect rights in society.

courses.name: Chemical Enginering
courses.description: Chemical Engineering is a course that teaches how to design and improve processes that convert raw materials into useful products such as fuels, medicines, plastics, and food. It combines chemistry, physics, mathematics, and engineering to solve real-world industrial and environmental problems
